commentable_entity.ask: Pledge to NOT see Aquaman 2 when it releases
commentable_entity.title: Pledge to not see Aquaman 2
commentable_entity.description:
We have all seen the trial between Amber Heard and Johnny Depp, and this has revealed a lot to us about the state of society in terms of abuse victims. Depp lost numerous deals, job offers and career opportunities as a result of Heard's accusations, but Heard has had no consequences from when many of these allegations turned out to be false.

We are sick of the double standard people have between male and female abuse victims, and the only way to truly have our voices heard is to hit them where it counts: their wallets. Let's show Hollywood that they cannot just sweep this under the rug, and that we will not tolerate such blatant support for an abuser.

By signing this petition, you pledge to not see the new Aquaman 2 movie IN ANY WAY. This includes streaming, theaters, and rentals. It all feeds into total movie sales for Warner Bros. We have to show them that they cannot get away with this one.Â 

All support is appreciated.
commentable_entity.user.description: Just a lone shark trying to change the world.

comment: I refuse to abide to the double standards when it comes to abuse. I refuse to support Amber, the director  or WB. Also i dont deal with bed sh*tters

comment:
I pledge not to watch A2 because she literally shat in her marital bed! I pledge not to watch , because Warner Bros. fired Depp over allegations, not charges, an investigation or verdict. Yet, somehow Heard is still on then payroll, even after audio of her admitting to getting physically violent and mentally abusing Depp! 
I watched Aquaman out of curiosity and I could see there was no chemistry between Momoa & Heard, just like with Justice League movie! They don't even look like they like each other!? If I set aside the trial and everything else. I still would pledge not to see this movie! 

I'd like to make it clear that I am not a not nor am I on Depp's payroll!
